alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 10:38AM AKST until February 01 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING FROM DILLINGHAM NORTH AND WEST... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts to 12 inches. East to northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...From Dillingham north and west. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions as well as reduced visibilities to one half mile or less at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS..As of 10 AM AKST, surface observations and webcam imagery were indicating moderate to heavy snowfall as well as reduced visibilities from Dillingham to New Stuyahok and Koliganek. Radar returns were also estimating snowfall rates of up to 1 inch per hour for these locations. Based on these observations, forecasted total snow amounts have been increased.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
